member.name: T:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.AssemblyExt
member.summary:
Extension class to easily extract assembly properties.
Included directly in Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling so that a reference to Nalco.Core is not required.

member.name: P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.DefaultContactInfo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Data Mobility Systems 358 U.S. Route One, Bldg #4 Falmouth, ME 04105 Phone: (207) 781-5700 Fax: (207) 781-5566 www.datamobility.com www.nalco.com.

member.name: P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.Details
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to {0}: {1}
.

member.name: P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.HTMLReport
P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.Info
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to

{0}

{1}
.

member.name: P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.MHTReport
P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.NextPart
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ----=NextPart_000.

member.name: P:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Properties.Resources.NotifyError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unhandled error occurred. A report with details about the error has been saved. It is recommended that you attempt to save any work and restart the program. If this error continues please contact an administrator..

member.summary: String representation of system physical memory profile.
member.returns: String representation of system physical memory profile.

member.name: M:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MemorySection.PageFile
member.summary: String representation of system page file memory profile.
member.returns: String representation of system page file memory profile.

member.name: M:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MemorySection.Virtual
member.summary: String representation of system virtual memory profile.
member.returns: String representation of system virtual memory profile.

member.name: T:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX
member.summary: Contains information about the current state of both physical and virtual memory, including extended memory. The GlobalMemoryStatusEx function stores information in this structure.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.length
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. You must set this member before calling GlobalMemoryStatusEx.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.memoryLoad
member.summary: A number between 0 and 100 that specifies the approximate percentage of physical memory that is in use (0 indicates no memory use and 100 indicates full memory use).

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.totalPhys
member.summary: The amount of actual physical memory, in bytes.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.availPhys
member.summary: The amount of physical memory currently available, in bytes.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.totalPageFile
member.summary: The current committed memory limit for the system or the current process, whichever is smaller, in bytes.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.availPageFile
member.summary: The maximum amount of memory the current process can commit, in bytes.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.totalVirtual
member.summary: The size of the user-mode portion of the virtual address space of the calling process, in bytes.

member.name: F:Nalco.Diagnostics.ErrorHandling.Sections.MEMORYSTATUSEX.availVirtual
member.summary: The amount of unreserved and uncommitted memory currently in the user-mode portion of the virtual address space of the calling process, in bytes.
